boons.name: Brutal Strength
boons.colour: A crimson glow shadows the boons.
boons.flavour: Bloodshed is one avenue to victory.
boons.stats: Gain 5/10/15 attack at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Death's Dance
boons.colour: A crimson glow shadows the boons.
boons.flavour: You're not letting them get away unscathed.
boons.stats: If your attack priority is equal to the enemy's attack priority, deal 4/8/12 damage at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Killing Blow
boons.colour: A crimson glow shadows the boons.
boons.flavour: As the end nears, you go for the kill.
boons.stats: Enemies left below 5/10/15% hp after an attack are automatically executed at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Hunter's Eye
boons.colour: A green light glimmers at the appearance of the boons.
boons.flavour: A keen eye is a hunter's best friend.
boons.stats: Gain 5/6/7 attack priority on all weapons at levels 1/2/3. If your weapon is a bow, gain 5/7/9 attack at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Precision Strike
boons.colour: A green light glimmers at the appearance of the boons.
boons.flavour: When the vitals are exposed, you take your best shot.
boons.stats: Gain a 10/15/20% chance to deal double damage on your normal attacks at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: First Strike
boons.colour: A green light glimmers at the appearance of the boons.
boons.flavour: The first shot is always the deadliest.
boons.stats: If you strike an enemy first, your attack will deal double damage.

boons.name: Heartbreaker
boons.colour: A rosy ambience warms the room.
boons.flavour: It's a single-sided love.
boons.stats: When attacked, there is a 10/20/30% chance to redirect 50% of damage taken to the attacker at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Charm
boons.colour: A rosy ambience warms the room.
boons.flavour: Your displays of talent knocks the enemies off their feet.
boons.stats: After using your special attack, there is a 20/30/40% chance to stun the target for one turn at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: False Weakness
boons.colour: A rosy ambience warms the room.
boons.flavour: Almost feels a little too easy.
boons.stats: Reduces enemies' attack by 10/15/20% at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Smite
boons.colour: A golden glow fills the room.
boons.flavour: You're not going down without a fight.
boons.stats: If you are to take lethal damage, execute the enemy who delivered the attack. If the enemy is a boss or miniboss, it deals 10% max hp damage instead.

boons.name: Thundering Fury
boons.colour: A golden glow fills the room.
boons.flavour: You're gonna make them remember your name.
boons.stats: Once you lose attack priority, remove 30/40/50% of the enemy's current defence at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Stormbreaker
boons.colour: A golden glow fills the room.
boons.flavour: Pierce the clouds and strike through the heart.
boons.stats: Your attacks deal an additional 2/4/6% of the enemy's max hp at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Sucky Wucky
boons.colour: A calming blue is emitted from the boons.
boons.flavour: The taking of life is such a waste... except when it's you.
boons.stats: 12.5/25/50% of all damage dealt is restored as hp at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Vitality
boons.colour: A calming blue is emitted from the boons.
boons.flavour: You feel a little bit better after that fight.
boons.stats: Restore 20hp now. After clearing a room, restore +5 hp. If your hp is maxed out, gain +2 max hp instead.

boons.name: High Tide
boons.colour: A calming blue is emitted from the boons.
boons.flavour: Last place you'd expect a second chance is hell, huh?
boons.stats: Replenish your extra life.

boons.name: Fortify
boons.colour: A lustrous yellow clashes with the darkened shadow of a navy blue.
boons.flavour: Your resolve is strengthened greatly.
boons.stats: Gain 20/30/40 defence. If your weapon is the shield, this effect is doubled to 40/50/60 defence at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Divine Protection
boons.colour: A lustrous yellow clashes with the darkened shadow of a navy blue.
boons.flavour: You feel empowered by an unknown feeling.
boons.stats: Gain a 4/8/12% chance to completely block the next instance of damage at levels 1/2/3.

boons.name: Second Wind
boons.colour: A lustrous yellow clashes with the darkened shadow of a navy blue.
boons.flavour: Pain is an afterthought.
boons.stats: Damage that would otherwise be lethal reduces your hp to 1. This boon deactivates for the rest of the floor.

boons.name: Berserker
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: It's time to test your skills...
boons.stats: Reduce your max hp to 10, but you gain a 500% damage bonus.

boons.name: Call to Arms
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: How about another go?
boons.stats: You can switch your weapon.

boons.name: Sheath
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: The word 'consequence' just became a lot clearer.
boons.stats: You gain +25 attack priority but deal 75% reduced damage.

boons.name: Exposed
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: Show your hand, and the enemies may come within striking distance.
boons.stats: You convert 75% of your current defence to attack.

boons.name: Satanic Ritual
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: Sacrifices must be made.
boons.stats: Transform your special attack into a satanic ritual. Once per room, immediately after casting your special attack, you lose attack priority for the next 5 turns. Once the ritual is complete, damage an enemy for 99% of their current hp.

boons.name: Thou Knoweth Not Weakness
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you.
boons.flavour: To gain strength, one must first know weakness.
boons.stats: For the next 3 rooms, lose -50% of your attack. Afterwards, gain an additional +25% of your original attack.
